resources.string: It seems you permanently declined fine location permission. You can go to app settings to grant it.
This app needs access to your fine location so that your measurement can be placed to correct location.
It seems you permanently declined background location permission. You can go to app settings to grant it.
This app needs access to your background location so that your measurement can be executed on the background too.
It seems you permanently declined read phone state permission. You can go to app settings to grant it.
This app needs access to your phone state so that app can determine mobile network parameters.
